settings.title:
PROUDLY SUPPORTING FRAN DRESCHER'S
CANCER SCHMANCER MOVEMENT!

SITE WIDE: 15% OF SALES WILL BE ALLOCATED TO SUPPORTING
CANCER SCHMANER
UNTIL THE END OF OCTOBER!
settings.des: Collaborating with Cancer Schmancer holds a special significance for me. I am presently caring for my dear friend that is battling cancer. In the midst of his chemotherapy journey, I sought to infuse some levity into his life. That's when we embarked on a delightful TV binge, starting with "The Nanny" featuring the incredible Fran Drescher, and journeyed through to "Beautician and the Beast," and beyond. Laughter truly proved to be the most potent remedy! Fran, your ability to bring joy into our lives during this challenging time is beyond measure. It's an honor to allocate 15% of Swiminista.com/CancerSchmancer sales towards supporting Cancer Schmancer.
